content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":171441,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ顔はかすかに青ざめたままだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"His face was still faintly pale."},{"lineNumber":171442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、気圧されるな、行くぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, don't be intimidated, let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":171443,"originalJapaneseLine":"恐瘴気の影響で★ランク１０以下のキャラは","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to the influence of the terrifying miasma, characters ranked ★10 or below"},{"lineNumber":171444,"originalJapaneseLine":"行動不能になりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"have become unable to act."},{"lineNumber":171445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むっ！　むむむ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph! Mm mm!\""},{"lineNumber":171446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？　やかましいぞ、カオス」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Noisy, Chaos.\""},{"lineNumber":171447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ビビッときた！　この気配は！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I sensed it! This presence!\""},{"lineNumber":171448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブリスか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it Cavebliss?\""},{"lineNumber":171449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、違う……これは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's different... this is...\""},{"lineNumber":171450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……魔王の気配だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...the presence of the Demon King.\""},{"lineNumber":171451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Demon King—"},{"lineNumber":171452,"originalJapaneseLine":"　って美樹ちゃんか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"—It's Miki-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":171453,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ど、どこですか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-where is it!?\""},{"lineNumber":171454,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこに――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where—!\""},{"lineNumber":171455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、ちょ、落ち着け！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, calm down!\""},{"lineNumber":171456,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この先、真っ直ぐ進んで一分か二分ってとこか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If we go straight ahead, it should be about one or two minutes away."},{"lineNumber":171457,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おそらくその辺りに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Probably somewhere around there...\""},{"lineNumber":171458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh—!\""},{"lineNumber":171459,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎は一目散に走り出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro took off running straight away."},{"lineNumber":171460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、この馬鹿！　勝手に行くな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you idiot! Don't go off on your own!\""},{"lineNumber":171461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様、追いかけましょう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lance-sama, let's chase after him!\""},{"lineNumber":171462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの馬鹿たれめ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That damn fool.\""},{"lineNumber":171463,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が追いかけると、","translatedEnglishLine":"As Lance and the others chased after him,"},{"lineNumber":171464,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎は魔物隊長と既に戦闘を行っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro was already engaged in combat with the monster captain."},{"lineNumber":171465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uoooooh!\""},{"lineNumber":171466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょわわわわ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, wait!\""},{"lineNumber":171467,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てめえ、挨拶もなく斬りかかるとは","translatedEnglishLine":"You attack without even greeting me,"},{"lineNumber":171468,"originalJapaneseLine":"　剣士の風上にも置けぬ奴めー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're disgraceful to all swordsmen!\""},{"lineNumber":171469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「健太郎さん！　大丈夫ですか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentaro-san! Are you alright!?\""},{"lineNumber":171470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、魔王はあの扉の先だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-the Demon King is beyond that door!\""},{"lineNumber":171471,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってことは、あの魔物隊長が門番ってわけだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That means that monster captain is the gatekeeper!\""},{"lineNumber":171472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げっ、まだ仲間がいたのかよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, there are still allies left!\""},{"lineNumber":171473,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おら、死ねーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, dieeee!\""},{"lineNumber":171474,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くーっ、ここで逃げても","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it, even if I run away here,"},{"lineNumber":171475,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスに殺されるだけか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll just end up getting killed by Cavebliss anyway!\""},{"lineNumber":171476,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我が名は誇り高き魔物ざむらい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My name is the proud monster samurai!"},{"lineNumber":171477,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物隊長アバシリ！　かかってこいやー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster captain Abashiri! Bring it on!\""},{"lineNumber":171478,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ちっ、案外こいつら強ぇな……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Tch, these guys are surprisingly strong..."},{"lineNumber":171479,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さーて、どうするか……）","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, what should I do...)"},{"lineNumber":171480,"originalJapaneseLine":"決定打のないままに戦闘が続き、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without a decisive blow, the battle continued,"},{"lineNumber":171481,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物隊長アバシリは内心、","translatedEnglishLine":"and inside, monster captain Abashiri"},{"lineNumber":171482,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘を続けること自体に迷いが生じていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was starting to feel doubt about continuing the fight."},{"lineNumber":171483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":171484,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":171485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どいて下さい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please move aside!"},{"lineNumber":171486,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おねがいします！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I beg of you!\""},{"lineNumber":171487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek...!\""},{"lineNumber":171488,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎の鋭い眼光に貫かれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Pierced by Kentaro's sharp gaze,"},{"lineNumber":171489,"originalJapaneseLine":"アバシリが思わず気圧される。","translatedEnglishLine":"Abashiri was unintentionally intimidated."},{"lineNumber":171490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「く、くそっ！　ケイブリスなんざの為に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-damn it! For the sake of Cavebliss or the like,"},{"lineNumber":171491,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな場所で命張れるかァ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't stake my life in a place like this!\""},{"lineNumber":171492,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、逃げた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, he's running away.\""},{"lineNumber":171493,"originalJapaneseLine":"アバシリは脇目も振らずに逃げ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Abashiri fled without looking back,"},{"lineNumber":171494,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっという間に姿を消した。","translatedEnglishLine":"disappearing in an instant."},{"lineNumber":171495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ、はぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff, huff...\""},{"lineNumber":171496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、大丈夫ですか、健太郎さん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-are you okay, Kentaro-san?"},{"lineNumber":171497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今、ヒーリングを……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will heal you now...\""},{"lineNumber":171498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":171499,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎はシィルの言葉を無視して、","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro ignored Shiru's words,"},{"lineNumber":171500,"originalJapaneseLine":"扉にすがりついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and clung to the door."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ顔はかすかに青ざめたままだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His face was still faintly pale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、気圧されるな、行くぞ」
恐瘴気の影響で★ランク１０以下のキャラは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to the influence of the terrifying miasma, characters ranked ★10 or below

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行動不能になりました。
「むっ！　むむむ！」
「あん？　やかましいぞ、カオス」
「ビビッときた！　この気配は！」
「ケイブリスか？」
「いや、違う……これは……」
「……魔王の気配だ」
「魔王――
って美樹ちゃんか！」
「ど、どこですか！？
どこに――！」
「ちょ、ちょ、落ち着け！」
「この先、真っ直ぐ進んで一分か二分ってとこか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we go straight ahead, it should be about one or two minutes away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おそらくその辺りに……」
健太郎は一目散に走り出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro took off running straight away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、この馬鹿！　勝手に行くな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you idiot! Don't go off on your own!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様、追いかけましょう！」
「あの馬鹿たれめ」
ランス達が追いかけると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Lance and the others chased after him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は魔物隊長と既に戦闘を行っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro was already engaged in combat with the monster captain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおっ！」
「ちょわわわわ！
てめえ、挨拶もなく斬りかかるとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You attack without even greeting me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣士の風上にも置けぬ奴めー！」
「健太郎さん！　大丈夫ですか！？」
「む、魔王はあの扉の先だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-the Demon King is beyond that door!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってことは、あの魔物隊長が門番ってわけだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That means that monster captain is the gatekeeper!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げっ、まだ仲間がいたのかよ！」
「おら、死ねーーー！」
「くーっ、ここで逃げても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it, even if I run away here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに殺されるだけか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll just end up getting killed by Cavebliss anyway!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我が名は誇り高き魔物ざむらい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My name is the proud monster samurai!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長アバシリ！　かかってこいやー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster captain Abashiri! Bring it on!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ちっ、案外こいつら強ぇな……
さーて、どうするか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, what should I do...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決定打のないままに戦闘が続き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without a decisive blow, the battle continued,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長アバシリは内心、
戦闘を続けること自体に迷いが生じていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was starting to feel doubt about continuing the fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どいて下さい！
おねがいします！」
健太郎の鋭い眼光に貫かれ、
アバシリが思わず気圧される。
「く、くそっ！　ケイブリスなんざの為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-damn it! For the sake of Cavebliss or the like,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな場所で命張れるかァ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't stake my life in a place like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、逃げた」
アバシリは脇目も振らずに逃げ、
あっという間に姿を消した。
「はぁ、はぁ……」
「だ、大丈夫ですか、健太郎さん。
今、ヒーリングを……」
健太郎はシィルの言葉を無視して、
扉にすがりついた。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
